column8: Installing fatigue and distraction monitoring cameras
column13: Installing fatigue and distraction monitoring cameras in Santos' Australian vehicle fleet is a proactive measure for preventing and mitigating occupational health and safety impacts linked to business relationships. These cameras effectively alert drowsy or distracted drivers in real time and provide valuable data to reduce such events in the future, thus enhancing safety for both employees and business partners involved in transportation activities.

column6: Prevention and mitigation of occupational health and safety impacts directly linked by business relationships
column13: Santos' 'Life Saving Rules' constitute a proactive approach to preventing and mitigating occupational health and safety impacts directly linked to business relationships. These rules are mandatory for all personnel working at Santos sites, with a clear focus on preventing High-Potential Events (HPEs). They are actively applied to every task, every day. They are based on rules with a demonstrated history of success, ensuring a comprehensive approach to safeguarding the health and safety of individuals within the organisation and its business relationships.
